content: Turn off disk space limit for this {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that allows users to turn off the disk space limit feature in the {{productName}} application. The text appears in a dialog box when users need to change storage quota settings. It provides context for translators to ensure the correct phrase is used in the corresponding language.

usage.context:
</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <StyledBodyContent>
 <Text noSelect>
 {isDisableQuota
 ? t("Common:TurnOffDiskSpaceLimit", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })
 : t("Common:SetDiskSpaceQuota", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' (space) is used incorrectly. It seems like a misunderstanding of the English 'for'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vypnutí limitu místa na disku pro tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ໂຕ້ຫນາ" (to na) is not the correct translation of 'disk space'. It generally means 'interface' or 'touchscreen'. A more accurate translation would involve a term related to storage or disk space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປິດຈໍາກັດເນື້ອທີ່ເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສໍາລັບ {{productName}} ນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Dezactivare limita spatiul de stocare pentru acest spațiu {{productName}}" is not accurate. The word 'spațiu' (space) is redundant. It should translate 'disk space limit' more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dezactivare limita spațiu de stocare pentru acest {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'තැටියේ' (tateiye) is not the standard way to refer to a disk. It literally means 'of the plate/saucer'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම {{productName}} සඳහා දත්ත ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ සීමාව අක්‍රිය කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'අක්‍රිය කරන්න' (akriya karrayanna) is correct for 'turn off', the phrasing might be more naturally expressed as 'හරිමින්' (harimin) or 'අයින් කරන්න' (ain karanne).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම {{productName}} සඳහා දත්ත ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ සීමාව හරිමින්.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'priestor' (space) is used incorrectly. It implies a location or area, not the disk space limitation itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vypnite obmedzenie miesta na disku pre tento {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation 'prostor' is used instead of 'izdelek' or a more appropriate term for 'product'. 'Prostor' means 'space' which doesn't accurately reflect the English 'product'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izklopite omejitev prostora na disku za ta izdelek {{productName}}.
